member.name: T:Sol.Unity.Extensions.ITokenMintResolver
member.summary: Contains the method used to resolve mint public key addresses into TokenDef objects.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.ITokenMintResolver.Resolve(System.String)
member.summary: Resolve a mint public key address into a TokenDef object.
member.returns: An instance of the TokenDef containing known info about this token or a constructed unknown entry.

member.name: T:Sol.Unity.Extensions.ITokenWalletRpcProxy
member.summary: This interface contains the subset of methods from RPC client used by TokenWallet.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.ITokenWalletRpcProxy.GetBalanceAsync(System.String,Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary:
Gets the balance asynchronously for a certain public key.
The commitment parameter is optional, the default value is not sent.
member.param: The public key.
The state commitment to consider when querying the ledger state.
member.returns: A task which may return a request result holding the context and address balance.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.ITokenWalletRpcProxy.GetTokenAccountsByOwnerAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary: Gets all SPL Token accounts by token owner.
member.param: Public key of account owner query, as base-58 encoded string.
Public key of the specific token Mint to limit accounts to, as base-58 encoded string.
Public key of the Token program ID that owns the accounts, as base-58 encoded string.
The state commitment to consider when querying the ledger state.
member.returns: Returns a task that holds the asynchronous operation result and state.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.ITokenWalletRpcProxy.GetRecentBlockHashAsync(Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary: Gets a recent block hash.
member.param: The state commitment to consider when querying the ledger state.
member.returns: Returns a task that holds the asynchronous operation result and state.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.ITokenWalletRpcProxy.SendTransactionAsync(System.Byte[],System.Boolean,Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary: Sends a transaction.
member.param: The signed transaction as byte array.
If true skip the prflight transaction checks (default false).
The block commitment used to retrieve block hashes and verify success.
member.returns: Returns a task that holds the asynchronous operation result and state.

member.name: T:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenDef
member.summary:
Token Definition object used by the TokenMintResolver
TokenMint uniquely identifies a token on the Solana blockchain. Symbol is purley cosmetic and is not sufficient to uniquely identify a token by itself.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenDef.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs a TokenDef instance.
member.param: The public key of the token mint address.
The display name for this token.
The token symbol used to display balances of this token.

member.name: P:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenDef.TokenMint
member.summary: The public key of the token mint address.

member.name: P:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenDef.TokenName
member.summary: The display name of this token, either user supplied or loaded from tokenlist.json

member.name: P:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenDef.Symbol

member.summary: Creates a clone of this TokenDef instance setting the decimalPlaces. Used to go from a TokenDef with unknown decimal places (-1) to known decimal places.

member.name: T:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList
member.summary:
A filterable list of TokenWalletAccounts.
Use the filter methods to select the accounts that you want to interact with.
To filter a subset of accounts, see ForToken, WithSymbol, WithMint, WithAtLeast, WhichAreAssociatedTokenAccounts,
To select individual accounts, see: WithPublicKey, AssociatedTokenAccount

member.name: F:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList._list
member.summary: Private list storage.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletAccount})
member.summary: Constructs an instance of TokenWalletFilterList with a list of accounts.
member.param: Some accounts to add to the list.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Get an enumerator for this list.
member.returns: An enumerator for this list.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary: Get an enumerator for this list.
member.returns: An enumerator for this list.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.ForToken(Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenDef)
member.summary: Keeps all accounts that match the TokenDef provided.
member.param: An instance of TokenDef to use for filtering.
member.returns: A filtered list of accounts that match the supplied TokenDef.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.WithSymbol(System.String)
member.summary:
Keeps all accounts with the token symbol supplied.
Be aware that token symbol does not guarentee you are interacting with the TokenMint you think. It is much safer to identify tokens using their token mint public key address.
member.param: A token symbol, e.g. USDC
member.returns: A filtered list of accounts for the given token symbol.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.WithPublicKey(System.String)
member.summary: Get the TokenWalletAccount for the public key provided.
member.param: Public key for the account
member.returns: The account with the matching public key or null if not found.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.WithMint(System.String)
member.summary: Keeps all accounts for the given token mint address.
member.param: Token mint public key address.
member.returns: A filtered list of accounts for the given mint.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.WithAtLeast(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Keeps all accounts with at least the supplied minimum balance.
member.param: A minimum balance value as decimal.
member.returns: A filtered list of accounts with at least the balance as decimal supplied.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.WithAtLeast(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Keeps all accounts with at least the supplied minimum balance.
member.param: A minimum balance value as ulong.
member.returns: A filtered list of accounts with at least the balance as raw ulong supplied.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.WithNonZero
member.summary: Keeps all accounts with a non-zero balance.
member.returns: A filtered list of accounts with at least the balance as raw ulong supplied.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.WhichAreAssociatedTokenAccounts
member.summary: Keeps all Associated Token Account instances in the list.
member.returns: A filtered list that only contains Associated Token Accounts.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.AssociatedTokenAccount
member.summary:
Return the first associated account found in the list or null.
Typically this would be used immediately after a WithMint for ForToken filter to identify the Associated Token Account for that token.
member.returns: The first matching Assocated Token Accounts in the list or null if none were found.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.Models.TokenWalletFilterList.WithCustomFilter(System.Predicate{Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletAccount})
member.summary: Keeps all instances that satisfy the filter provided.
member.param: The filter to use.
member.returns: A filtered list that only contains matching.

member.name: T:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver
member.summary:
The default implementation of the TokenMintResolver.
You can create your own by implementing ITokenMintResolver.
You can use the Load method to load the Solana ecosystem's standard token list or populate your own instance with TokenDef objects.

member.name: F:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.TOKENLIST_GITHUB_URL
member.summary: The URL of the standard token list

member.name: F:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver._tokens
member.summary: Internal lookfor for resolving mint public key addresses to TokenDef objects.

member.name: P:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.KnownTokens
member.summary: Map of known tokens.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs an empty TokenMintResolver object.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.#ctor(Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenListDoc)
member.summary: Constructs an empty TokenMintResolver and populates with deserialized TokenListDoc.
member.param: A deserialised token list.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.Load
member.summary: Return an instance of the TokenMintResolver loaded with the Solana token list.
member.returns: An instance of the TokenMintResolver populated with Solana token list definitions.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Return an instance of the TokenMintResolver loaded dererialised token list JSON from the specified URL.
member.returns: An instance of the TokenMintResolver populated with Solana token list definitions.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.LoadAsync
member.summary: Return an instance of the TokenMintResolver loaded with the Solana token list.
member.returns: A task that will result in an instance of the TokenMintResolver populated with Solana token list definitions.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.LoadAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Return an instance of the TokenMintResolver loaded with the Solana token list.
member.returns: A task that will result in an instance of the TokenMintResolver populated with Solana token list definitions.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.ParseTokenList(System.String)
member.summary: Return an instance of the TokenMintResolver loaded with the dererialised JSON string supplied.
member.param: The JSON to parse - should be shaped the same as the Solana token list.
member.returns: An instance of the TokenMintResolver populated with the deserialized JSON provided.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.Resolve(System.String)
member.summary:
Resolve a token mint public key address into the token def.
If a token is not known, a default Unknown TokenDef instance with be created for that mint and stashed for any future lookups.
Unknown tokens will have decimal places of -1 by design. This will prevent their use when converting decimal balance values into lamports for TransactionBuilder. It is unlikely this scenario will be encountered often as Unknown token are encounted by the TokenWallet Load method when processing TokenAccountInfo RPC results that do contain the decimal places.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.Add(Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenDef)
member.summary: Add a token to the TokenMintResolver lookup. Any collisions on token mint will replace the previous instance.
member.param: An instance of TokenDef to be added.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMintResolver.Add(Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenMint.TokenListItem)
member.summary: Construct a TokenDef instance populated with extension goodies from the Solana token list.
member.param: A TokenListItem instance.

member.name: T:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet
member.summary:
An object that represents the token wallet accounts that belong to a wallet address and methods to send tokens to other wallets whilst transparantly handling the complexities of Associated Token Accounts.
Use Load method to get started and Send method to send tokens.

member.summary: RPC client instance

member.name: P:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet.MintResolver

member.name: P:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet.Sol

member.summary: Refresh balances and token accounts The state commitment to consider when querying the ledger state.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet.RefreshAsync(Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary: Refresh balances and token accounts The state commitment to consider when querying the ledger state. A task that results true once complete.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet.Balances
member.summary: Get consolidated token balances across all sub-accounts for each token mint in this wallet.
member.returns: An array of TokenWalletBalance objects, one per token mint in this wallet.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet.TokenAccounts
member.summary:
Returns a TokenWalletFilterList of sub-accounts in this wallet address.
Use the filter methods ForToken, WithSymbol, WithAtLeast, WithMint, AssociatedTokenAccount methods to select the sub-account you want to use.
member.returns: Results a list of TokenWalletAccounts for filtering.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet.Send(Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletAccount,System.Decimal,Sol.Unity.Wallet.PublicKey,Sol.Unity.Wallet.PublicKey,System.Func{Sol.Unity.Rpc.Builders.TransactionBuilder,System.Byte[]})
member.summary: Send tokens from source to target wallet Associated Token Account for the token mint.
member.para: The source parameter is a TokenWalletAccount instance that tokens will be sent from. They will be deposited into an Associated Token Account in the destination wallet. If an Associated Token Account does not exist, it will be created at the cost of feePayer.
member.param: Source account of tokens to be sent.
Human readable amount of tokens to send.
Destination wallet address.
PublicKey of the fee payer address.
Call back function used to sign the TransactionBuilder.
member.returns: A task that results in the transaction signature submitted to the RPC node.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet.Send(Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletAccount,System.Decimal,System.String,Sol.Unity.Wallet.PublicKey,System.Func{Sol.Unity.Rpc.Builders.TransactionBuilder,System.Byte[]})
member.summary: Send tokens from source to target wallet Associated Token Account for the token mint.
member.para: The source parameter is a TokenWalletAccount instance that tokens will be sent from. They will be deposited into an Associated Token Account in the destination wallet. If an Associated Token Account does not exist, it will be created at the cost of feePayer.
member.param: Source account of tokens to be sent.
Human readable amount of tokens to send.
Destination wallet address.
PublicKey of the fee payer address.
Call back function used to sign the TransactionBuilder.
member.returns: The transaction signature submitted to the RPC node.

member.summary: Send tokens from source to target wallet Associated Token Account for the token mint.
member.para: The source parameter is a TokenWalletAccount instance that tokens will be sent from. They will be deposited into an Associated Token Account in the destination wallet. If an Associated Token Account does not exist, it will be created at the cost of feePayer.
member.param: Source account of tokens to be sent.
Human readable amount of tokens to send.
Destination wallet address.
PublicKey of the fee payer address.
Call back function used to sign the TransactionBuilder.
member.returns: A task that results in the transaction signature submitted to the RPC node.

member.summary: Send tokens from source to target wallet Associated Token Account for the token mint.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWallet.JitCreateAssociatedTokenAccount(Sol.Unity.Rpc.Builders.TransactionBuilder,System.String,Sol.Unity.Wallet.PublicKey)
member.summary: Checks for a target Associated Token Account for the given mint and prepares one if not found.
member.para: Use this method to conditionally create a target Associated Token Account in this wallet as part of your own builder.
member.param: The TransactionBuilder create account logic will be added to if required.
The public key of the mint for the Associated Token Account.
The account that will fund the account creation if required.
member.returns: The public key of the Associated Token Account that will be created.

member.summary: Compute the Associated Token Account address in this wallet for a given mint.
member.param: The public key of the mint for the Associated Token Account.
member.returns: The public key of the Associated Token Account.

member.summary: Does a public key belong to a subaccount of this wallet?

member.name: F:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletRpcProxy._client
member.summary: The RPC client to use.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletRpcProxy.#ctor(Sol.Unity.Rpc.IRpcClient)
member.summary: Constructs an instance of the TokenWalletRpcProxy.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletRpcProxy.GetBalanceAsync(System.String,Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary:
Gets the balance asynchronously for a certain public key.
The commitment parameter is optional, the default value is not sent.
member.param: The public key.
The state commitment to consider when querying the ledger state.
member.returns: A task which may return a request result holding the context and address balance.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletRpcProxy.GetRecentBlockHashAsync(Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary: Gets a recent block hash.
member.param: The state commitment to consider when querying the ledger state.
member.returns: Returns a task that holds the asynchronous operation result and state.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletRpcProxy.GetTokenAccountsByOwnerAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary: Gets all SPL Token accounts by token owner.
member.param: Public key of account owner query, as base-58 encoded string.
Public key of the specific token Mint to limit accounts to, as base-58 encoded string.
Public key of the Token program ID that owns the accounts, as base-58 encoded string.
The state commitment to consider when querying the ledger state.
member.returns: Returns a task that holds the asynchronous operation result and state.

member.name: M:Sol.Unity.Extensions.TokenWalletRpcProxy.SendTransactionAsync(System.Byte[],System.Boolean,Sol.Unity.Rpc.Types.Commitment)
member.summary: Sends a transaction.
member.param: The signed transaction as byte array.
If true skip the prflight transaction checks (default false).
The block commitment used to retrieve block hashes and verify success.
member.returns: Returns an object that wraps the result along with possible errors with the request.
